body:
Hi!



I am trying to figure out if it is possible to show isocontours for the Daylight Autonomy analysis for the different percentages: 10, 20, 30, etc..

Is there a way, or a component that does that?

In the file attached there is an attempt where I highlighted a range of points around 50%, but I got just this far, and I do not know if there is a better way.



Thanks always for the help.

Best regards,



Federico

replies.body:
I would try the LB_contourMesh component for that.

-A.

That is the one!

Thanks very much!
